overview: Sonu and Afrin are both seven years old. They both has enimety with each others. sonu have a pet's goat buck in his house and he loves it.rnsonu's father Jagdish is the indian soldier, also this village is proudly known for soldier's village.rnafter some days, india and Pakistan's war gets started. jagdish has in war and his mother vow in front of god that if jagdish will come back home neat then she will killed buck goat for god into save the buck sonu and afrin becomes friends. the film is about to how they saved buck and how were the soldiers family tackle war situation when war began.
title: India Is My Country
